page.title: 11The Sawmills, Windley
page.content:
{Flower Lilies Sawmills,Windley
About thirty years ago, Mr.V. Barber set up a woodyard in Windley. Now his son Mr.G.Barber is also in the business.He needs to fetch about 70 tons of timber each week to ensure enough work for the eight employees.It is really quite a dangerous job. They use a forklift to get the wood onto the lorries.There are all kinds of big saws for dealing with the wood. The most expensive kinds of wood are oak and yew while mixed hardwoods are the cheapest. Once, they were burning some tree tops at a village school. Some people thought the school was on fire so they called the Fire Brigade. When the men got back from their lunch they found the treetops were covered in foam!
